languages.text: {n}Кассия с едва слышным шорохом ткани и звоном украшений оправляет свое одеяние.{/n}
{n}With a soft rustling of cloth and clinking of jewellery, Cassia adjusts her clothing.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Кассия с едва слышным шорохом ткани и звоном украшений оправляет свое одеяние.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Con un leve murmullo de ropa y el tintineo de sus joyas, Cassia se ajusta la ropa.{/n}

languages.text: {n}カサカサと布を揺らして装飾品を鳴らしながら、カシアは服を整えた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a soft rustling of cloth and clinking of jewellery, Cassia adjusts her clothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}カサカサと布を揺らして装飾品を鳴らしながら、カシアは服を整えた。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}你的身旁传来布料摩擦声与珠宝碰撞的响动，原来是卡西娅在整理衣服。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a soft rustling of cloth and clinking of jewellery, Cassia adjusts her clothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你的身旁传来布料摩擦声与珠宝碰撞的响动，原来是卡西娅在整理衣服。{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Cassia ajuste sa tenue dans un doux bruissement d'étoffe et un tintement de bijoux.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a soft rustling of cloth and clinking of jewellery, Cassia adjusts her clothing.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Cassia ajuste sa tenue dans un doux bruissement d'étoffe et un tintement de bijoux.{/n}
traits.speaker: CassiaCompanion

languages.text: {n}Mit einem leichten Rascheln von Stoff und Klimpern von Schmuck richtet Cassia sich die Kleidung.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a soft rustling of cloth and clinking of jewellery, Cassia adjusts her clothing.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Cassia, kumaştan yayılan hafif hışırtı ve mücevheratın şıkırtısı eşliğinde üstünü başını düzeltiyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}With a soft rustling of cloth and clinking of jewellery, Cassia adjusts her clothing.{/n}
